questions.question: Which type of tectonic plate boundary is formed when two plates move toward each other and one subducts beneath the other?

options: High birth rate and high death rate
High birth rate and falling death rate
Low birth rate and low death rate
Falling birth rate and low death rate

options: Subduction zones and associated earthquakes and volcanoes

options: Meander with slip-off slope and river cliff

options: Intensity of ground motion at a specific location

options: Dark impermeable surfaces absorbing more solar radiation
Higher elevation compared to surrounding countryside

options: A country has more than 100 persons per km²
Population exceeds the carrying capacity of available resources

options: Has the most diverse ethnic population in a country
Is at least twice as large as the second-largest city and dominates the national economy
Was the first city established in a country
Has a population exceeding 10 million (a megacity)

questions.question: Which process drives the movement of tectonic plates according to the most widely accepted scientific model?
options: Mantle convection currents and slab pull
